SEARCH
Package org.opencastproject.index.service.resources.list.query

Class SeriesListQuery

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.list.impl.ResourceListQueryImpl
org.opencastproject.index.service.resources.list.query.SeriesListQuery
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.opencastproject.list.api.ResourceListQuery
public class SeriesListQuery extends org.opencastproject.list.impl.ResourceListQueryImpl
Query for the series list. The following filters can be used:
  • contributors
  • subject
  • language
  • creator
  • license
  • access policy
  • creation date
